The web spun by Spinarak can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that this Pokémon can determine what kind of prey is touching its web just by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web's strands.
fr:
Spinarak (Japonais:イトマルItomaru) est un type doubleBogue/PoisonPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
La toile tissée par Spinarak peut être considérée comme son deuxième système nerveux. On dit que ce Pokémon peut déterminer quel type de proie touche sa toile simplement par les minuscules vibrations qu'il ressent à travers les brins de la toile.

name: ariados
en:
Ariados (Japanese: アリアドス Ariados) is a dual-type Bug/Poison Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Ariados's feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. This Pokémon constricts the foe with thin and strong silk webbing.
fr:
Ariados (Japonais:アリアドスAriados) est un type doubleBogue/PoisonPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Les pieds d'Ariados sont munis de minuscules griffes crochues qui lui permettent de se saborder sur les plafonds et les murs verticaux. Ce Pokémon resserre l'ennemi avec une fine et solide toile de soie.

name: crobat
en:
Crobat (Japanese: クロバット Crobat) is a dual-type Poison/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
If this Pokémon is flying by fluttering only a pair of wings on either the forelegs or hind legs, it's proof that Crobat has been flying a long distance. It switches the wings it uses if it is tired.
fr:
Crobat (Japonais:クロバットCrobat) est un type doublePoison/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Si ce Pokémon vole en battant seulement une paire d'ailes sur les pattes avant ou arrière, c'est la preuve que Crobat a volé sur une longue distance. Il change les ailes qu'il utilise s'il est fatigué.

name: chinchou
en:
Chinchou (Japanese: チョンチー Chonchie) is a dual-type Water/Electric Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Chinchou lets loose positive and negative electrical charges from its two antennas to make its prey faint. This Pokémon flashes its electric lights to exchange signals with others.
fr:
Chinchou (Japonais:チョンチーChonchie) est un type doubleL'eau/ÉlectriquePokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Chinchou laisse échapper des charges électriques positives et négatives de ses deux antennes pour faire s'évanouir sa proie. Ce Pokémon fait clignoter ses lumières électriques pour échanger des signaux avec les autres.

name: lanturn
en:
Lanturn (Japanese: ランターン Lantern) is a dual-type Water/Electric Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Lanturn is nicknamed "the deep-sea star" for its illuminated antenna. This Pokémon produces light by causing a chemical reaction between bacteria and its bodily fluids inside the antenna.
fr:
Lanturn (Japonais:ランターンLantern) est un type doubleL'eau/ÉlectriquePokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Lanturn est surnommée "l'étoile des profondeurs" pour son antenne illuminée. Ce Pokémon produit de la lumière en provoquant une réaction chimique entre les bactéries et ses fluides corporels à l'intérieur de l'antenne.

name: pichu
en:
Pichu (Japanese: ピチュー Pichu) is an Electric-type baby Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Pichu charges itself with electricity more easily on days with thunderclouds or when the air is very dry. You can hear the crackling of static electricity coming off this Pokémon.

name: cleffa
en:
Cleffa (Japanese: ピィ Py) is a Fairy-type baby Pokémon introduced in Generation II. Prior to Generation VI, it was a Normal-type Pokémon.
On nights with many shooting stars, Cleffa can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance through the night and stop only at the break of day, when these Pokémon quench their thirst with the morning dew.

name: igglybuff
en:
Igglybuff (Japanese: ププリン Pupurin) is a dual-type Normal/Fairy baby Pokémon introduced in Generation II. Prior to Generation VI, it was a pure Normal-type.
Igglybuff's vocal chords are not sufficiently developed. It would hurt its throat if it were to sing too much. This Pokémon gargles with freshwater from a clean stream.
fr:
Igglybuff (Japonais:ププリンPupurin) est un type doubleNormal/FéebébéPokémonintroduit dansGénération II. Antérieur àGénération VI, c'était un pur type Normal.
Les cordes vocales d'Igglybuff ne sont pas suffisamment développées. Il lui ferait mal à la gorge s'il chantait trop. Ce Pokémon se gargarise avec de l'eau douce provenant d'un ruisseau propre.

name: togepi
en:
Togepi (Japanese: トゲピー Togepy) is a Fairy-type baby Pokémon introduced in Generation II. Prior to Generation VI, it was a Normal-type Pokémon.
As its energy, Togepi uses the positive emotions of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and Pokémon. This Pokémon stores up feelings of happiness inside its shell, then shares them with others.
fr:
Togepi (Japonais:トゲピーTogepy) est unType de féebébé Pokémonintroduit dansGénération II. Antérieur àGénération VI, c'était unType normalPokémon.
Comme énergie, Togepi utilise les émotions positives de compassion et de plaisir dégagées par les gens et les Pokémon. Ce Pokémon stocke des sentiments de bonheur dans sa carapace, puis les partage avec les autres.

name: togetic
en:
Togetic (Japanese: トゲチック Togechick) is a dual-type Fairy/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II. Prior to Generation VI, it was a dual-type Normal/Flying Pokémon.
Togetic is said to be a Pokémon that brings good fortune. When the Pokémon spots someone who is pure of heart, it is said to appear and share its happiness with that person.

name: natu
en:
Natu (Japanese: ネイティ Naty) is a dual-type Psychic/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Natu cannot fly because its wings are not yet fully grown. If your eyes meet with this Pokémon's eyes, it will stare back intently at you. But if you move even slightly, it will hop away to safety.
fr:
Natu (Japonais:ネイティNaty) est un type doublePsychique/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Natu ne peut pas voler car ses ailes ne sont pas encore complètement développées. Si vos yeux rencontrent les yeux de ce Pokémon, il vous fixera intensément. Mais si vous vous déplacez même légèrement, il sautera en toute sécurité.

name: xatu
en:
Xatu (Japanese: ネイティオ Natio) is a dual-type Psychic/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Xatu stands rooted and still in one spot all day long. People believe that this Pokémon does so out of fear of the terrible things it has foreseen in the future.
Mareep (Japanese: メリープ Merriep) is an Electric-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Mareep's fluffy coat of wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more static electricity is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the tip of its tail grows.
fr:
Xatu (Japonais:ネイティオNatio) est un double typePsychique/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Xatu reste enraciné et immobile au même endroit toute la journée. Les gens croient que ce Pokémon le fait par peur des choses terribles qu'il a prévues à l'avenir.
marep (Japonais:メリープMerriep) est unDe type électriquePokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Le manteau de laine moelleux de Mareep se frotte et crée une charge statique. Plus l'électricité statique est chargée, plus l'ampoule au bout de sa queue devient brillante.

name: flaaffy
en:
Flaaffy (Japanese: モココ Mokoko) is an Electric-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Flaaffy's wool quality changes so that it can generate a high amount of static electricity with a small amount of wool. The bare and slick parts of its hide are shielded against electricity.

name: ampharos
en:
Ampharos (Japanese: デンリュウ Denryu) is an Electric-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Ampharos gives off so much light that it can be seen even from space. People in the old days used the light of this Pokémon to send signals back and forth with others far away.
fr:
Ampharos (Japonais:デンリュウDenryu) est unDe type électriquePokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Ampharos émet tellement de lumière qu'il peut être vu même de l'espace. Autrefois, les gens utilisaient la lumière de ce Pokémon pour envoyer des signaux dans les deux sens avec d'autres personnes éloignées.

name: bellossom
en:
Bellossom (Japanese: キレイハナ Kireihana) is a Grass-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
When Bellossom get exposed to plenty of sunlight, the leaves ringing its body begin to spin around. This Pokémon's dancing is renowned in southern lands.

name: marill
en:
Marill (Japanese: マリル Maril) is a dual-type Water/Fairy Pokémon introduced in Generation II. Prior to Generation VI, it was a pure Water-type Pokémon.
Marill's oil-filled tail acts much like a life preserver. If you see just its tail bobbing on the water's surface, it's a sure indication that this Pokémon is diving beneath the water to feed on aquatic plants.

name: azumarill
en:
Azumarill (Japanese: マリルリ Marilli) is a dual-type Water/Fairy Pokémon introduced in Generation II. Prior to Generation VI, it was a pure Water-type Pokémon.
Azumarill's long ears are indispensable sensors. By focusing its hearing, this Pokémon can identify what kinds of prey are around, even in rough and fast-running rivers.
fr:
Azumarill (Japonais:マリルリMarilli) est un type doubleL'eau/FéePokémonintroduit dansGénération II. Antérieur àGénération VI, c'était un purType d'eauPokémon.
Les longues oreilles d'Azumarill sont des capteurs indispensables. En concentrant son ouïe, ce Pokémon peut identifier les types de proies qui l'entourent, même dans les rivières agitées et rapides.

name: sudowoodo
en:
Sudowoodo (Japanese: ウソッキー Usokkie) is a Rock-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Sudowoodo camouflages itself as a tree to avoid being attacked by enemies. However, because the forelegs remain green throughout the year, the Pokémon is easily identified as a fake during the winter.

name: politoed
en:
Politoed (Japanese: ニョロトノ Nyorotono) is a Water-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
The curled hair on Politoed's head is proof of its status as a king. It is said that the longer and more curled the hair, the more respect this Pokémon earns from its peers.

name: hoppip
en:
Hoppip (Japanese: ハネッコ Hanecco) is a dual-type Grass/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
This Pokémon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds, Hoppip links its leaves with other Hoppip to prepare against being blown away.
fr:
Hoppip (Japonais:ハネッコHanecco) est un type doubleGazon/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Ce Pokémon dérive et flotte avec le vent. S'il sent l'approche de vents forts, Hoppip relie ses feuilles à d'autres Hoppip pour se préparer à ne pas être emporté.

name: skiploom
en:
Skiploom (Japanese: ポポッコ Popocco) is a dual-type Grass/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Skiploom's flower blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees F. How much the flower opens depends on the temperature. For that reason, this Pokémon is sometimes used as a thermometer.
fr:
Skiploom (Japonais:ポ ポ ッ コPopocco) est un type doubleGazon/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
La fleur de Skiploom fleurit lorsque la température dépasse 64 degrés F. La quantité d'ouverture de la fleur dépend de la température. Pour cette raison, ce Pokémon est parfois utilisé comme thermomètre.

name: jumpluff
en:
Jumpluff (Japanese: ワタッコ Watacco) is a dual-type Grass/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is floating.
fr:
Jumpluff (Japonais:ワタッコWatacco) est un type doubleGazon/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Jumpluff chevauche les vents chauds du sud pour traverser la mer et s'envoler vers des terres étrangères. Le Pokémon descend au sol lorsqu'il rencontre de l'air froid alors qu'il flotte.

name: aipom
en:
Aipom (Japanese: エイパム Eipam) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Aipom's tail ends in a hand-like appendage that can be cleverly manipulated. However, because the Pokémon uses its tail so much, its real hands have become rather clumsy.

name: sunkern
en:
Sunkern (Japanese: ヒマナッツ Himanuts) is a Grass-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Sunkern tries to move as little as it possibly can. It does so because it tries to conserve all the nutrients it has stored in its body for its evolution. It will not eat a thing, subsisting only on morning dew.

name: sunflora
en:
Sunflora (Japanese: キマワリ Kimawari) is a Grass-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as soon as the sun goes down for the night.

name: yanma
en:
Yanma (Japanese: ヤンヤンマ Yanyanma) is a dual-type Bug/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair. This Pokémon uses its flying ability to quickly chase down targeted prey.
fr:
Yanma (Japonais:ヤンヤンマYanyanma) est un type doubleBogue/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Yanma est capable de voir à 360 degrés sans avoir à bouger les yeux. C'est un excellent pilote qui sait faire des arrêts brusques et tourner en l'air. Ce Pokémon utilise sa capacité de vol pour chasser rapidement les proies ciblées.

name: wooper
en:
Wooper (Japanese: ウパー Upah) is a dual-type Water/Ground Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Wooper usually live in water. However, it occasionally comes out onto land in search of food. On land, it coats its body with a gooey, toxic film.
fr:
Wooper (Japonais:ウパーUpah) est un type doubleL'eau/SolPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Wooper vit généralement dans l'eau. Cependant, il sort occasionnellement sur terre à la recherche de nourriture. Sur terre, il enduit son corps d'une pellicule gluante et toxique.

name: quagsire
en:
Quagsire (Japanese: ヌオー Nuoh) is a dual-type Water/Ground Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Quagsire hunts for food by leaving its mouth wide open in water and waiting for its prey to blunder in unaware. Because the Pokémon does not move, it does not get very hungry.

name: espeon
en:
Espeon (Japanese: エーフィ Eifie) is a Psychic-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Espeon is extremely loyal to any trainer it considers to be worthy. It is said that this Pokémon developed its precognitive powers to protect its trainer from harm.
fr:
Espeon (Japonais:エーフィEifie) est unType psychiquePokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Espeon est extrêmement fidèle à tout entraîneur qu'il considère comme digne. On dit que ce Pokémon a développé ses pouvoirs précognitifs pour protéger son dresseur du mal.

name: umbreon
en:
Umbreon (Japanese: ブラッキー Blacky) is a Dark-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Umbreon evolved as a result of exposure to the moon's waves. It hides silently in darkness and waits for its foes to make a move. The rings on its body glow when it leaps to attack.

name: murkrow
en:
Murkrow (Japanese: ヤミカラス Yamikarasu) is a dual-type Dark/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Murkrow was feared and loathed as the alleged bearer of ill fortune. This Pokémon shows strong interest in anything that sparkles or glitters. It will even try to steal rings from women.
fr:
Murkrow (Japonais:ヤミカラスYamikarasu) est un type doubleSombre/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Murkrow était craint et détesté en tant que porteur présumé de la malchance. Ce Pokémon montre un vif intérêt pour tout ce qui scintille ou scintille. Il essaiera même de voler des bagues aux femmes.

name: slowking
en:
Slowking (Japanese: ヤドキング Yadoking) is a dual-type Water/Psychic Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Slowking undertakes research every day in an effort to solve the mysteries of the world. However, this Pokémon apparently forgets everything it has learned if the Shellder on its head comes off.

name: misdreavus
en:
Misdreavus (Japanese: ムウマ Muma) is a Ghost-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Misdreavus frightens people with a creepy, sobbing cry. The Pokémon apparently uses its red spheres to absorb the fearful feelings of foes and turn them into nutrition.
fr:
Misdreavus (Japonais:ムウマMaman) est unType fantômePokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Misdreavus effraie les gens avec un cri effrayant et sanglotant. Le Pokémon utilise apparemment ses sphères rouges pour absorber les sentiments de peur des ennemis et les transformer en nourriture.

name: unown
en:
Unown (Japanese: アンノーン Unknown) is a Psychic-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.
fr:
Zarbi (Japonais:アンノーンInconnu) est unType psychiquePokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Ce Pokémon a la forme d'une écriture ancienne. C'est un mystère quant à savoir qui est venu en premier, les écrits anciens ou les divers Zarbi. Les recherches sur ce sujet sont en cours mais rien n'est connu.

name: wobbuffet
en:
Wobbuffet (Japanese: ソーナンス Sonans) is a Psychic-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
If two or more Wobbuffet meet, they will turn competitive and try to outdo the other's endurance. However, they may try to see which one can endure the longest without food. Trainers need to beware of this habit.
fr:
Wobbuffet (Japonais:ソーナンスSonans) est unType psychiquePokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Si deux Wobbuffet ou plus se rencontrent, ils deviendront compétitifs et tenteront de surpasser l'endurance de l'autre. Cependant, ils peuvent essayer de voir lequel peut supporter le plus longtemps sans nourriture. Les formateurs doivent se méfier de cette habitude.

name: girafarig
en:
Girafarig (Japanese: キリンリキ Kirinriki) is a dual-type Normal/Psychic Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Girafarig's rear head also has a brain, but it is small. The rear head attacks in response to smells and sounds. Approaching this Pokémon from behind can cause the rear head to suddenly lash out and bite.
fr:
Girafarig (Japonais:キ リ ン リ キKirinriki) est un type doubleNormal/PsychiquePokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
La tête arrière de Girafarig a également un cerveau, mais il est petit. La tête arrière attaque en réponse aux odeurs et aux sons. S'approcher de ce Pokémon par derrière peut provoquer une attaque et une morsure soudaines de la tête arrière.

name: pineco
en:
Pineco (Japanese: クヌギダマ Kunugidama) is a Bug-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Pineco hangs from a tree branch and patiently waits for prey to come along. If the Pokémon is disturbed while eating by someone shaking its tree, it drops down to the ground and explodes with no warning.

name: forretress
en:
Forretress (Japanese: フォレトス Foretos) is a dual-type Bug/Steel Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Forretress conceals itself inside its hardened steel shell. The shell is opened when the Pokémon is catching prey, but it does so at such a quick pace that the shell's inside cannot be seen.
fr:
Forretress (Japonais:フォレトスForetos) est un double typeBogue/AcierPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Forretress se cache à l'intérieur de sa coque en acier trempé. La coquille s'ouvre lorsque le Pokémon attrape une proie, mais il le fait à un rythme si rapide que l'intérieur de la coquille ne peut pas être vu.

name: dunsparce
en:
Dunsparce (Japanese: ノコッチ Nokocchi) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Dunsparce has a drill for its tail. It uses this tail to burrow into the ground backwards. This Pokémon is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.
fr:
Dunsparce (Japonais:ノコッチNokocchi) est unType normalPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Dunsparce a une perceuse pour sa queue. Il utilise cette queue pour s'enfouir dans le sol à l'envers. Ce Pokémon est connu pour faire son nid dans des formes complexes profondément sous le sol.

name: gligar
en:
Gligar (Japanese: グライガー Gliger) is a dual-type Ground/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then injects the prey with its poison barb.
fr:
Gligar (Japonais:グライガーGliger) est un type doubleSol/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Gligar glisse dans les airs sans faire de bruit comme s'il glissait. Ce Pokémon s'accroche au visage de son ennemi à l'aide de ses pattes arrière griffues et des grandes pinces de ses pattes avant, puis injecte à la proie son ardillon empoisonné.

name: steelix
en:
Steelix (Japanese: ハガネール Haganeil) is a dual-type Steel/Ground Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Steelix lives even further underground than Onix. This Pokémon is known to dig towards the earth's core. There are records of this Pokémon reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
fr:
Steelix (Japonais:ハガネールHaganeil) est un type doubleAcier/SolPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Steelix vit encore plus sous terre qu'Onix. Ce Pokémon est connu pour creuser vers le noyau terrestre. Il existe des enregistrements de ce Pokémon atteignant une profondeur de plus de six dixièmes de mile sous terre.

name: snubbull
en:
Snubbull (Japanese: ブルー Bulu) is a Fairy-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II. Prior to Generation VI, it was a Normal-type Pokémon.
By baring its fangs and making scary face, Snubbull sends smaller Pokémon scurrying away in terror. However, this Pokémon seems a little sad at making its foes flee.

name: granbull
en:
Granbull (Japanese: グランブル Granbulu) is a Fairy-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II. Prior to Generation VI, it was a Normal-type Pokémon.
Granbull has a particularly well- developed lower jaw. The enormous fangs are heavy, causing the Pokémon to tip its head back for balance. Unless it is startled, it will not try to bite indiscriminately.
fr:
Granbull (Japonais:グランブルGranbulu) est unType de féePokémonintroduit dansGénération II. Antérieur àGénération VI, c'était unType normalPokémon.
Granbull a une mâchoire inférieure particulièrement bien développée. Les énormes crocs sont lourds, obligeant le Pokémon à pencher la tête en arrière pour l'équilibre. À moins qu'il ne soit surpris, il n'essaiera pas de mordre sans discernement.

name: qwilfish
en:
Qwilfish (Japanese: ハリーセン Harysen) is a dual-type Water/Poison Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Qwilfish sucks in water, inflating itself. This Pokémon uses the pressure of the water it swallowed to shoot toxic quills all at once from all over its body. It finds swimming somewhat challenging.
fr:
Qwilfish (Japonais:ハリーセンHarysen) est un type doubleL'eau/PoisonPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Qwilfish aspire l'eau, se gonflant. Ce Pokémon utilise la pression de l'eau qu'il a avalée pour tirer des piquants toxiques d'un coup sur tout son corps. Il trouve la natation quelque peu difficile.

name: scizor
en:
Scizor (Japanese: ハッサム Hassam) is a dual-type Bug/Steel Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Scizor has a body with the hardness of steel. It is not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. This Pokémon flaps its wings to regulate its body temperature.

name: shuckle
en:
Shuckle (Japanese: ツボツボ Tsubotsubo) is a dual-type Bug/Rock Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Shuckle quietly hides itself under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its hard shell while eating berries it has stored away. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice.

name: heracross
en:
Heracross (Japanese: ヘラクロス Heracros) is a dual-type Bug/Fighting Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Heracross charges in a straight line at its foe, slips beneath the foe's grasp, and then scoops up and hurls the opponent with its mighty horn. This Pokémon even has enough power to topple a massive tree.

name: sneasel
en:
Sneasel (Japanese: ニューラ Nyula) is a dual-type Dark/Ice Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Sneasel scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the bark. This Pokémon seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while the parents are away.
fr:
Sneasel (Japonais:ニューラNyula) est un type doubleSombre/La glacePokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Sneasel escalade les arbres en enfonçant ses griffes crochues dans l'écorce. Ce Pokémon cherche des nids non gardés et vole des œufs pour se nourrir pendant que les parents sont absents.

name: teddiursa
en:
Teddiursa (Japanese: ヒメグマ Himeguma) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
This Pokémon likes to lick its palms that are sweetened by being soaked in honey. Teddiursa concocts its own honey by blending fruits and pollen collected by Beedrill.
fr:
Teddiursa (Japonais:ヒ メ グ マHimeguma) est unType normalPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Ce Pokémon aime lécher ses paumes qui sont sucrées en étant imbibées de miel. Teddiursa concocte son propre miel en mélangeant des fruits et du pollen collecté par Beedrill.

name: ursaring
en:
Ursaring (Japanese: リングマ Ringuma) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
In the forests inhabited by Ursaring, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where they gather food. This Pokémon walks through its forest gathering food every day.
fr:
Ursaring (Japonais:リングマRinguma) est unType normalPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Dans les forêts habitées par Ursaring, on dit qu'il y a de nombreux ruisseaux et arbres imposants où ils recueillent de la nourriture. Ce Pokémon se promène chaque jour dans sa forêt pour ramasser de la nourriture.

name: slugma
en:
Slugma (Japanese: マグマッグ Magmag) is a Fire-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Molten magma courses throughout Slugma's circulatory system. If this Pokémon is chilled, the magma cools and hardens. Its body turns brittle and chunks fall off, reducing its size.
fr:
Slugma (Japonais:マグマッグMagmag) est unType de feuPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Cours de magma en fusion dans tout le système circulatoire de Slugma. Si ce Pokémon est refroidi, le magma se refroidit et durcit. Son corps devient cassant et des morceaux tombent, ce qui réduit sa taille.

name: magcargo
en:
Magcargo (Japanese: マグカルゴ Magcargot) is a dual-type Fire/Rock Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Magcargo's shell is actually its skin that hardened as a result of cooling. Its shell is very brittle and fragile - just touching it causes it to crumble apart. This Pokémon returns to its original size by dipping itself in magma.
fr:
Magcargo (Japonais:マグカルゴMagcargot) est un type doubleFeu/RochePokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
La coque de Magcargo est en fait sa peau qui a durci à la suite du refroidissement. Sa coquille est très cassante et fragile - le simple fait de la toucher la fait s'effondrer. Ce Pokémon retrouve sa taille d'origine en se plongeant dans du magma.

name: swinub
en:
Swinub (Japanese: ウリムー Urimoo) is a dual-type Ice/Ground Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Swinub roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of dead grass. This Pokémon occasionally roots out hot springs.
fr:
Swinub (Japonais:ウリムーUrimoo) est un type doubleLa glace/SolPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Swinub s'enracine pour se nourrir en frottant son museau contre le sol. Sa nourriture préférée est un champignon qui pousse sous le couvert d'herbes mortes. Ce Pokémon déracine parfois des sources chaudes.

name: piloswine
en:
Piloswine (Japanese: イノムー Inomoo) is a dual-type Ice/Ground Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Piloswine is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enables it to endure the freezing cold. This Pokémon uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.
fr:
Piloswine (Japonais:イノムーInomoo) est un double typeLa glace/SolPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Le Piloswine est recouvert d'une épaisse couche de poils longs qui lui permet de supporter le froid glacial. Ce Pokémon utilise ses défenses pour déterrer de la nourriture enterrée sous la glace.

name: corsola
en:
Corsola (Japanese: サニーゴ Sunnygo) is a dual-type Water/Rock Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Corsola's branches glitter very beautifully in seven colors when they catch sunlight. If any branch breaks off, this Pokémon grows it back in just one night.

name: remoraid
en:
Remoraid (Japanese: テッポウオ Teppouo) is a Water-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Remoraid sucks in water, then expels it at high velocity using its abdominal muscles to shoot down flying prey. When evolution draws near, this Pokémon travels downstream from rivers.
fr:
Rémoraid (Japonais:テッポウオTeppouo) est unType d'eauPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Remoraid aspire de l'eau, puis l'expulse à grande vitesse en utilisant ses muscles abdominaux pour abattre des proies volantes. À l'approche de l'évolution, ce Pokémon se déplace en aval des rivières.

name: octillery
en:
Octillery (Japanese: オクタン Okutank) is a Water-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Octillery grabs onto its foe using its tentacles. This Pokémon tries to immobilize it before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, Octillery spews ink to escape.

name: delibird
en:
Delibird (Japanese: デリバード Delibird) is a dual-type Ice/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Delibird carries its food bundled up in its tail. There once was a famous explorer who managed to reach the peak of Mount Everest thanks to one of these Pokémon sharing its food.
fr:
Delibird (Japonais:デリバードDelibird) est un double typeLa glace/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Delibird porte sa nourriture emmitouflée dans sa queue. Il était une fois un célèbre explorateur qui réussit à atteindre le sommet du mont Everest grâce à l'un de ces Pokémon partageant sa nourriture.

name: mantine
en:
Mantine (Japanese: マンタイン Mantain) is a dual-type Water/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
On sunny days, schools of Mantine can be seen elegantly leaping over the sea's waves. This Pokémon is not bothered by the Remoraid that hitches rides.
fr:
Mantine (Japonais:マンタインMantain) est un type doubleL'eau/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Aux beaux jours, on peut voir des bancs de Mantine sauter élégamment par-dessus les vagues de la mer. Ce Pokémon n'est pas gêné par le Remoraid qui fait de l'auto-stop.

name: skarmory
en:
Skarmory (Japanese: エアームド Airmd) is a dual-type Steel/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Skarmory is entirely encased in hard, protective armor. This Pokémon flies at close to 190 mph. It slashes foes with its wings that possess swordlike cutting edges.
fr:
Airmure (Japonais:エアームドAirmd) est un double typeAcier/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Skarmory est entièrement enfermé dans une armure dure et protectrice. Ce Pokémon vole à près de 190 mph. Il taillade ses ennemis avec ses ailes qui possèdent des tranchants en forme d'épée.

name: houndour
en:
Houndour (Japanese: デルビル Delvil) is a dual-type Dark/Fire Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Houndour hunt as a coordinated pack. They communicate with each other using a variety of cries to corner their prey. This Pokémon's remarkable teamwork is unparalleled.
fr:
Houndour (Japonais:デルビルDelvil) est un type doubleSombre/FeuPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Houndour chasse en meute coordonnée. Ils communiquent entre eux en utilisant une variété de cris pour acculer leur proie. Le remarquable travail d'équipe de ce Pokémon est inégalé.

name: houndoom
en:
Houndoom (Japanese: ヘルガー Hellgar) is a dual-type Dark/Fire Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
In a Houndoom pack, the one with its horns raked sharply towards the back serves a leadership role. These Pokémon choose their leader by fighting amongst themselves.
fr:
Houndoom (Japonais:ヘルガーHellgar) est un type doubleSombre/FeuPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Dans un pack Houndoom, celui avec ses cornes fortement ratissées vers l'arrière joue un rôle de leader. Ces Pokémon choisissent leur chef en se battant entre eux.

name: kingdra
en:
Kingdra (Japanese: キングドラ Kingdra) is a dual-type Water/Dragon Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Kingdra lives at extreme ocean depths that are otherwise uninhabited. It has long been believed that the yawning of this Pokémon creates spiraling ocean currents.
fr:
Kingdra (Japonais:キ ン グ ド ラKingdra) est un type doubleL'eau/DragonPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Kingdra vit à des profondeurs océaniques extrêmes qui sont autrement inhabitées. On a longtemps cru que le bâillement de ce Pokémon créait des courants océaniques en spirale.

name: phanpy
en:
Phanpy (Japanese: ゴマゾウ Gomazou) is a Ground-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
For its nest, Phanpy digs a vertical pit in the ground at the edge of a river. It marks the area around its nest with its trunk to let the others know that the area has been claimed.
fr:
Phanpy (Japonais:ゴ マ ゾ ウGomazou) est unType de solPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Pour son nid, Phanpy creuse une fosse verticale dans le sol au bord d'une rivière. Il marque la zone autour de son nid avec sa trompe pour faire savoir aux autres que la zone a été revendiquée.

name: donphan
en:
Donphan (Japanese: ドンファン Donfan) is a Ground-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Donphan's favorite attack is curling its body into a ball, then charging at its foe while rolling at high speed. Once it starts rolling, this Pokémon can't stop very easily.

name: porygon2
en:
Porygon2 (Japanese: ポリゴン２ Porygon2) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Porygon2 was created by humans using the power of science. The man-made Pokémon has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
fr:
Porygon2 (Japonais:ポリゴン２Porygon2) est unType normalPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Porygon2 a été créé par des humains utilisant le pouvoir de la science. Le Pokémon créé par l'homme a été doté d'une intelligence artificielle qui lui permet d'apprendre par lui-même de nouveaux gestes et émotions.

name: stantler
en:
Stantler (Japanese: オドシシ Odoshishi) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Stantler's magnificent antlers were traded at high prices as works of art. As a result, this Pokémon was hunted close to extinction by those who were after the priceless antlers.

name: smeargle
en:
Smeargle (Japanese: ドーブル Doble) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Smeargle marks the boundaries of its territory using a body fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this Pokémon have been found.

name: tyrogue
en:
Tyrogue (Japanese: バルキー Balkie) is a Fighting-type baby Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Tyrogue becomes stressed out if it does not get to train every day. When raising this Pokémon, the Trainer must establish and uphold various training methods.

name: hitmontop
en:
Hitmontop (Japanese: カポエラー Kapoerer) is a Fighting-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Hitmontop spins on its head at high speeds, all the while delivering kicks. This technique is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense at the same time. The Pokémon travels faster spinning than it does walking.
fr:
Hitmontop (Japonais:カ ポ エ ラ ーKapoerer) est unType de combatPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Hitmontop tourne sur sa tête à grande vitesse, tout en donnant des coups de pied. Cette technique est un mélange remarquable d'attaque et de défense en même temps. Le Pokémon se déplace plus vite en tournoyant qu'en marchant.

name: smoochum
en:
Smoochum (Japanese: ムチュール Muchul) is a dual-type Ice/Psychic baby Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Smoochum actively runs about, but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives, it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasn't become dirty.
fr:
Smoochum (Japonais:ムチュールMuchul) est un type doubleLa glace/Psychiquebébé Pokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Smoochum court activement, mais tombe aussi assez souvent. Chaque fois que l'occasion se présentera, il cherchera son reflet pour s'assurer que son visage n'est pas devenu sale.

name: elekid
en:
Elekid (Japanese: エレキッド Elekid) is an Electric-type baby Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Elekid stores electricity in its body. If it touches metal and accidentally discharges all its built-up electricity, this Pokémon begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.
fr:
Elekid (Japonais:エレキッドElekid) est unDe type électriquebébé Pokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Elekid stocke l'électricité dans son corps. S'il touche du métal et décharge accidentellement toute son électricité accumulée, ce Pokémon commence à balancer ses bras en cercles pour se recharger.

name: magby
en:
Magby (Japanese: ブビィ Buby) is a Fire-type baby Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Magby's state of health is determined by observing the fire it breathes. If the Pokémon is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.
fr:
Magby (Japonais:ブビィBuby) est unType de feubébé Pokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
L'état de santé de Magby est déterminé en observant le feu qu'il crache. Si le Pokémon crache des flammes jaunes de sa bouche, il est en bonne santé. Lorsqu'il est fatigué, une fumée noire se mêle aux flammes.

name: miltank
en:
Miltank (Japanese: ミルタンク Miltank) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Miltank gives over five gallons of milk on a daily basis. Its sweet milk is enjoyed by children and grown-ups alike. People who can't drink milk turn it into yogurt and eat it instead.

name: blissey
en:
Blissey (Japanese: ハピナス Happinas) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Blissey senses sadness with its fluffy coat of fur. If it does so, this Pokémon will rush over to the sad person, however far they may be, to share an egg of happiness that brings a smile to any face.
fr:
Blissey (Japonais:ハピナスHappinas) est unType normalPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Blissey sent la tristesse avec son manteau de fourrure duveteux. S'il le fait, ce Pokémon se précipitera vers la personne triste, aussi loin qu'elle soit, pour partager un œuf de bonheur qui fera sourire n'importe quel visage.

name: raikou
en:
Raikou (Japanese: ライコウ Raikou) is an Electric-type Legendary Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of this Pokémon send shock waves shuddering through the air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come crashing down. This Pokémon races across the land while barking a cry that sounds like crashing thunder.

name: entei
en:
Entei (Japanese: エンテイ Entei) is a Fire-type Legendary Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch. A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.
fr:
Entei (japonais :エンテイEntei) est unType de feuPokémon Légendaireintroduit dansGénération II.
Entei incarne la passion du magma. On pense que ce Pokémon est né lors de l'éruption d'un volcan. Il envoie des rafales de feu massives qui consument complètement tout ce qu'elles touchent. Un Pokémon qui court à travers le pays. On dit qu'on naît à chaque fois qu'un nouveau volcan apparaît.

name: suicune
en:
Suicune (Japanese: スイクン Suicune) is a Water-type Legendary Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gracefulness. This Pokémon has the power to purify dirty water. This Pokémon races across the land. It is said that north winds will somehow blow whenever it appears.
fr:
Suicune (japonais :スイクンSuicune) est unType d'eauPokémon Légendaireintroduit dansGénération II.
Suicune incarne la compassion d'une source d'eau pure. Il traverse le pays avec grâce. Ce Pokémon a le pouvoir de purifier l'eau sale. Ce Pokémon court à travers le pays. On dit que les vents du nord souffleront d'une manière ou d'une autre chaque fois qu'ils apparaîtront.

name: larvitar
en:
Larvitar (Japanese: ヨーギラス Yogiras) is a dual-type Rock/Ground Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Larvitar is born deep under the ground. To come up to the surface, this Pokémon must eat its way through the soil above. Until it does so, Larvitar cannot see its parent's face.
fr:
Larvitar (Japonais:ヨーギラスYogiras) est un type doubleRoche/SolPokémonintroduit dansGénération II.
Larvitar est né profondément sous terre. Pour remonter à la surface, ce Pokémon doit se frayer un chemin à travers le sol au-dessus. Jusqu'à ce qu'il le fasse, Larvitar ne peut pas voir le visage de son parent.

name: pupitar
en:
Pupitar (Japanese: サナギラス Sanagiras) is a dual-type Rock/Ground Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Pupitar creates a gas inside its body that it compresses and forcefully ejects to propel itself like a jet. The body is very durable - it avoids damage even if it hits solid steel.

name: tyranitar
en:
Tyranitar (Japanese: バンギラス Bangiras) is a dual-type Rock/Dark pseudo-legendary Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Tyranitar is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. This Pokémon wanders about in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.
fr:
Tyranitar (Japonais:バンギラスBangiras) est un type doubleRoche/SombrePokémon pseudo-légendaireintroduit dansGénération II.
Tyranitar est si puissant qu'il peut abattre toute une montagne pour faire son nid. Ce Pokémon erre dans les montagnes à la recherche de nouveaux adversaires à combattre.

name: lugia
en:
Lugia (Japanese: ルギア Lugia) is a dual-type Psychic/Flying Legendary Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
Lugia's wings pack devastating power - a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this Pokémon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea. It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm. It is said that it quietly spends its time deep at the bottom of the sea because its powers are too strong.

name: celebi
en:
Celebi (Japanese: セレビィ Celebi) is a dual-type Psychic/Grass Mythical Pokémon introduced in Generation II.
This Pokémon came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright and shining future awaits us. When Celebi disappears deep in the forest, it is said to leave behind an egg it brought from the future.

name: treecko
en:
Treecko (Japanese: キモリ Kimori) is a Grass-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Treecko is cool, calm, and collected - it never panics under any situation. If a bigger foe were to glare at this Pokémon, it would glare right back without conceding an inch of ground.
fr:
Treecko (Japonais:キ モ リKimori) est unType d'herbePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Treecko est cool, calme et recueilli - il ne panique jamais dans aucune situation. Si un ennemi plus gros regardait ce Pokémon, il le regarderait tout de suite sans concéder un pouce de terrain.

name: grovyle
en:
Grovyle (Japanese: ジュプトル Juptile) is a Grass-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
The leaves growing out of Grovyle's body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This Pokémon is a master at climbing trees in jungles.
fr:
Grovyle (Japonais:ジュプトルjuptile) est unType d'herbePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Les feuilles qui poussent sur le corps de Grovyle sont pratiques pour le camoufler des ennemis dans la forêt. Ce Pokémon est passé maître dans l'art de grimper aux arbres dans la jungle.

name: sceptile
en:
Sceptile (Japanese: ジュカイン Jukain) is a Grass-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
The leaves growing on Sceptile's body are very sharp edged. This Pokémon is very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
fr:
Sceptile (Japonais:ジュカインJukain) est unType d'herbePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Les feuilles qui poussent sur le corps de Sceptile sont très tranchantes. Ce Pokémon est très agile - il saute sur toutes les branches des arbres et saute sur son ennemi par dessus ou par derrière.

name: torchic
en:
Torchic (Japanese: アチャモ Achamo) is a Fire-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Torchic has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame. Give it a hug - it will be glowing with warmth. This Pokémon is covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.

name: combusken
en:
Combusken (Japanese: ワカシャモ Wakasyamo) is a dual-type Fire/Fighting Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Combusken toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This Pokémon's legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out ten kicks in one second.
fr:
combusken (Japonais:ワカシャモWakasyamo) est un type doubleFeu/CombatPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Combusken endurcit ses jambes et ses cuisses en courant à travers champs et montagnes. Les jambes de ce Pokémon possèdent à la fois vitesse et puissance, ce qui lui permet de donner dix coups de pied en une seconde.

name: blaziken
en:
Blaziken (Japanese: バシャーモ Bursyamo) is a dual-type Fire/Fighting Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Blaziken has incredibly strong legs - it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon's blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.
fr:
Blaziken (Japonais:バシャーモBursyamo) est unde type doubleFeu/CombatPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Blaziken a des jambes incroyablement fortes - il peut facilement nettoyer un immeuble de 30 étages en un seul bond. Les coups de poing flamboyants de ce Pokémon laissent ses ennemis brûlés et noircis.

name: mudkip
en:
Mudkip (Japanese: ミズゴロウ Mizugorou) is a Water-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
The fin on Mudkip's head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this Pokémon can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.
fr:
Mudkip (Japonais:ミズゴロウMizugorou) est unType d'eauPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
La nageoire sur la tête de Mudkip agit comme un radar très sensible. En utilisant cette nageoire pour détecter les mouvements de l'eau et de l'air, ce Pokémon peut déterminer ce qui se passe autour de lui sans utiliser ses yeux.

name: marshtomp
en:
Marshtomp (Japanese: ヌマクロー Numacraw) is a dual-type Water/Ground Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at swimming. This Pokémon's hindquarters exhibit obvious development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.

name: swampert
en:
Swampert (Japanese: ラグラージ Laglarge) is a dual-type Water/Ground Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Swampert is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This Pokémon also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
fr:
Swampert (Japonais:ラグラージLaglarge) est un type dualL'eau/SolPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Swampert est très fort. Il a assez de puissance pour traîner facilement un rocher pesant plus d'une tonne. Ce Pokémon a également une vision puissante qui lui permet de voir même dans les eaux troubles.

name: poochyena
en:
Poochyena (Japanese: ポチエナ Pochiena) is a Dark-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
At first sight, Poochyena takes a bite at anything that moves. This Pokémon chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.

name: mightyena
en:
Mightyena (Japanese: グラエナ Graena) is a Dark-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Mightyena gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This Pokémon will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
fr:
Mightyena (Japonais:グ ラ エ ナGraena) est uneDe type sombrePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Mightyena donne des signaux évidents lorsqu'elle se prépare à attaquer. Il commence à grogner profondément puis aplatit son corps. Ce Pokémon mordra sauvagement avec ses crocs pointus.

name: zigzagoon
en:
Zigzagoon (Japanese: ジグザグマ Jiguzaguma) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Zigzagoon restlessly wanders everywhere at all times. This Pokémon does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything that it happens to see.

name: linoone
en:
Linoone (Japanese: マッスグマ Massuguma) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Linoone always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This Pokémon is very challenged by gently curving roads.

name: wurmple
en:
Wurmple (Japanese: ケムッソ Kemusso) is a Bug-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Wurmple is targeted by Swellow as prey. This Pokémon will try to resist by pointing the spikes on its rear at the attacking predator. It will weaken the foe by leaking poison from the spikes.
fr:
Wurmple (Japonais:ケムッソKemusso) est unType de boguePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Wurmple est ciblé par Swellow comme proie. Ce Pokémon tentera de résister en pointant les pointes sur son dos vers le prédateur attaquant. Il affaiblira l'ennemi en laissant échapper du poison des pointes.

name: silcoon
en:
Silcoon (Japanese: カラサリス Karasalis) is a Bug-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Silcoon tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There, this Pokémon hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.

name: beautifly
en:
Beautifly (Japanese: アゲハント Agehunt) is a dual-type Bug/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Beautifly's favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this Pokémon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.

name: cascoon
en:
Cascoon (Japanese: マユルド Mayuld) is a Bug-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This Pokémon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
fr:
Cascoon (Japonais:マユルドMayuld) est unType de boguePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Cascoon fabrique son cocon protecteur en enveloppant entièrement son corps d'une fine soie issue de sa bouche. Une fois que la soie fait le tour de son corps, elle durcit. Ce Pokémon prépare son évolution à l'intérieur du cocon.

name: dustox
en:
Dustox (Japanese: ドクケイル Dokucale) is a dual-type Bug/Poison Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Dustox is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this Pokémon are attracted by the bright light of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
fr:
Dustox (Japonais:ドクケイルDokucale) est un type doubleBogue/PoisonPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Dustox est instinctivement attiré par la lumière. Des essaims de ce Pokémon sont attirés par la lumière vive des villes, où ils font des ravages en arrachant les feuilles des arbres en bordure de route pour se nourrir.

name: lotad
en:
Lotad (Japanese: ハスボー Hassboh) is a dual-type Water/Grass Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Lotad live in ponds and lakes, where they float on the surface. It grows weak if its broad leaf dies. On rare occasions, this Pokémon travels on land in search of clean water.
fr:
Lotad (Japonais:ハスボーHassboh) est un type doubleL'eau/GazonPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Les Lotad vivent dans les étangs et les lacs, où ils flottent à la surface. Il s'affaiblit si sa large feuille meurt. En de rares occasions, ce Pokémon voyage sur terre à la recherche d'eau propre.

name: lombre
en:
Lombre (Japanese: ハスブレロ Hasubrero) is a dual-type Water/Grass Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Lombre's entire body is covered by a slippery, slimy film. It feels horribly unpleasant to be touched by this Pokémon's hands. Lombre is often mistaken for a human child.
fr:
Lombre (Japonais:ハスブレロHasubrero) est un type doubleL'eau/GazonPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Le corps entier de Lombre est recouvert d'un film glissant et visqueux. C'est horriblement désagréable d'être touché par les mains de ce Pokémon. Lombre est souvent confondu avec un enfant humain.

name: ludicolo
en:
Ludicolo (Japanese: ルンパッパ Runpappa) is a dual-type Water/Grass Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Ludicolo begins dancing as soon as it hears cheerful, festive music. This Pokémon is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking outings.

name: seedot
en:
Seedot (Japanese: タネボー Taneboh) is a Grass-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Seedot attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch. The more water it drinks, the glossier this Pokémon's body becomes.
fr:
Seedot (Japonais:タネボーTaneboh) est unType d'herbePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Seedot s'attache à une branche d'arbre en utilisant le haut de sa tête. Il aspire l'humidité de l'arbre tout en étant suspendu à la branche. Plus il boit d'eau, plus le corps de ce Pokémon devient brillant.

name: nuzleaf
en:
Nuzleaf (Japanese: コノハナ Konohana) is a dual-type Grass/Dark Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
This Pokémon pulls out the leaf on its head and makes a flute with it. The sound of Nuzleaf's flute strikes fear and uncertainty in the hearts of people lost in a forest.
fr:
Nuzleaf (Japonais:コノハナKonohana) est un type doubleGazon/SombrePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Ce Pokémon sort la feuille sur sa tête et en fait une flûte. Le son de la flûte de Nuzleaf fait naître la peur et l'incertitude dans le cœur des personnes perdues dans une forêt.

name: shiftry
en:
Shiftry (Japanese: ダーテング Dirteng) is a dual-type Grass/Dark Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Shiftry is a mysterious Pokémon that is said to live atop towering trees dating back over a thousand years. It creates terrific windstorms with the fans it holds.
fr:
Shiftry (Japonais:ダーテングDirteng) est un type doubleGazon/SombrePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Shiftry est un Pokémon mystérieux qui, dit-on, vit au sommet d'arbres imposants datant de plus de mille ans. Il crée de formidables tempêtes de vent avec les ventilateurs qu'il contient.

name: taillow
en:
Taillow (Japanese: スバメ Subame) is a dual-type Normal/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Taillow courageously stands its ground against foes, however strong they may be. This gutsy Pokémon will remain defiant even after a loss. On the other hand, it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.
fr:
Taillow (Japonais:スバメSubame) est un type doubleNormal/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Taillow résiste courageusement à ses ennemis, aussi forts soient-ils. Ce Pokémon courageux restera provocant même après une défaite. Par contre, il crie fort s'il a faim.

name: swellow
en:
Swellow (Japanese: オオスバメ Ohsubame) is a dual-type Normal/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Swellow flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This Pokémon dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by Swellow's clawed feet, preventing escape.

name: wingull
en:
Wingull (Japanese: キャモメ Camome) is a dual-type Water/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Wingull has the habit of carrying prey and valuables in its beak and hiding them in all sorts of locations. This Pokémon rides the winds and flies as if it were skating across the sky.

name: pelipper
en:
Pelipper (Japanese: ペリッパー Pelipper) is a dual-type Water/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Pelipper is a flying transporter that carries small Pokémon and Eggs inside its massive bill. This Pokémon builds its nest on steep cliffs facing the sea.
fr:
Pelipper (Japonais:ペリッパーPelipper) est un double typeL'eau/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Pelipper est un transporteur volant qui transporte de petits Pokémon et des œufs à l'intérieur de son bec massif. Ce Pokémon construit son nid sur des falaises abruptes face à la mer.

name: ralts
en:
Ralts (Japanese: ラルトス Ralts) is a dual-type Psychic/Fairy Pokémon introduced in Generation III. Prior to Generation VI, it was a pure Psychic-type Pokémon.
Ralts senses the emotions of people using the horns on its head. This Pokémon rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws closer if it senses that the person has a positive disposition.

name: kirlia
en:
Kirlia (Japanese: キルリア Kirlia) is a dual-type Psychic/Fairy Pokémon introduced in Generation III. Prior to Generation VI, it was a pure Psychic-type Pokémon.
It is said that a Kirlia that is exposed to the positive emotions of its Trainer grows beautiful. This Pokémon controls psychokinetic powers with its highly developed brain.
fr:
Kirlia (Japonais:キ ル リ アKirlia) est un type doublePsychique/FéePokémonintroduit dansGénération III. Antérieur àGénération VI, c'était un purType psychiquePokémon.
On dit qu'un Kirlia exposé aux émotions positives de son dresseur devient beau. Ce Pokémon contrôle les pouvoirs psychocinétiques grâce à son cerveau très développé.

name: gardevoir
en:
Gardevoir (Japanese: サーナイト Sirknight) is a dual-type Psychic/Fairy Pokémon introduced in Generation III. Prior to Generation VI, it was a pure Psychic-type Pokémon.
Gardevoir has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its Trainer, this Pokémon is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.
fr:
Gardevoir (Japonais:サーナイトSirknight) est un type doublePsychique/FéePokémonintroduit dansGénération III. Antérieur àGénération VI, c'était un purType psychiquePokémon.
Gardevoir a la capacité de lire l'avenir. S'il sent un danger imminent pour son Dresseur, on dit que ce Pokémon libère son énergie psychocinétique à pleine puissance.

name: surskit
en:
Surskit (Japanese: アメタマ Ametama) is a dual-type Bug/Water Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
From the tips of its feet, Surskit secretes an oil that enables it to walk on water as if it were skating. This Pokémon feeds on microscopic organisms in ponds and lakes.

name: masquerain
en:
Masquerain (Japanese: アメモース Amemoth) is a dual-type Bug/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Masquerain intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns on its antennas. This Pokémon flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even sideways and backwards - as if it were a helicopter.
fr:
Masquerain (Japonais:アメモースAmemoth) est un type doubleBogue/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Masquerain intimide les ennemis avec les motifs en forme d'œil sur ses antennes. Ce Pokémon bat ses quatre ailes pour voler librement dans n'importe quelle direction - même latéralement et en arrière - comme s'il s'agissait d'un hélicoptère.

name: shroomish
en:
Shroomish (Japanese: キノココ Kinococo) is a Grass-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Shroomish live in damp soil in the dark depths of forests. They are often found keeping still under fallen leaves. This Pokémon feeds on compost that is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.

name: breloom
en:
Breloom (Japanese: キノガッサ Kinogassa) is a dual-type Grass/Fighting Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Breloom closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. This Pokémon's fighting technique puts boxers to shame.

name: slakoth
en:
Slakoth (Japanese: ナマケロ Namakero) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Slakoth's heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens, it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this Pokémon in motion.
fr:
Slakoth (Japonais:ナマケロNamakero) est unType normalPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Le cœur de Slakoth ne bat qu'une fois par minute. Quoi qu'il arrive, il se contente de flâner immobile. Il est rare de voir ce Pokémon en mouvement.

name: vigoroth
en:
Vigoroth (Japanese: ヤルキモノ Yarukimono) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Vigoroth is always itching and agitated to go on a wild rampage. It simply can't tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This Pokémon's stress level rises if it can't be moving constantly.

name: slaking
en:
Slaking (Japanese: ケッキング Kekking) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Slaking spends all day lying down and lolling about. It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach, this Pokémon reluctantly moves to another spot.

name: nincada
en:
Nincada (Japanese: ツチニン Tutinin) is a dual-type Bug/Ground Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Nincada lives underground. It uses its sharp claws to carve the roots of trees and absorb moisture and nutrients. This Pokémon can't withstand bright sunlight so avoids it.
fr:
Ningale (Japonais:ツチニンTutinin) est un type doubleBogue/SolPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Nincada vit sous terre. Il utilise ses griffes acérées pour tailler les racines des arbres et absorber l'humidité et les nutriments. Ce Pokémon ne supporte pas la lumière du soleil, alors évitez-le.

name: ninjask
en:
Ninjask (Japanese: テッカニン Tekkanin) is a dual-type Bug/Flying Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Ninjask moves around at such a high speed that it cannot be seen, even while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this Pokémon was long believed to be invisible.
fr:
Ninjask (Japonais:テ ッ カ ニ ンTekkanin) est un type doubleBogue/En volantPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Ninjask se déplace à une vitesse si élevée qu'il ne peut pas être vu, même si ses pleurs peuvent être clairement entendus. Pour cette raison, ce Pokémon a longtemps été considéré comme invisible.

name: shedinja
en:
Shedinja (Japanese: ヌケニン Nukenin) is a dual-type Bug/Ghost Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Shedinja's hard body doesn't move - not even a twitch. In fact, its body appears to be merely a hollow shell. It is believed that this Pokémon will steal the spirit of anyone peering into its hollow body from its back.
fr:
Shedinja (Japonais:ヌケニンNukenin) est un type doubleBogue/FantômePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Le corps dur de Shedinja ne bouge pas - pas même un tic. En fait, son corps semble n'être qu'une coquille creuse. On pense que ce Pokémon volera l'esprit de quiconque regarde dans son corps creux depuis son dos.

name: whismur
en:
Whismur (Japanese: ゴニョニョ Gonyonyo) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Normally, Whismur's voice is very quiet - it is barely audible even if one is paying close attention. However, if this Pokémon senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.

name: loudred
en:
Loudred (Japanese: ドゴーム Dogohmb) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Loudred shouts while stamping its feet. After it finishes shouting, this Pokémon becomes incapable of hearing anything for a while. This is considered to be a weak point.

name: exploud
en:
Exploud (Japanese: バクオング Bakuong) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Exploud triggers earthquakes with the tremors it creates by bellowing. If this Pokémon violently inhales from the ports on its body, it's a sign that it is preparing to let loose a huge bellow.
fr:
Exploud (Japonais:バクオングBakouong) est unType normalPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Exploud déclenche des tremblements de terre avec les tremblements qu'il crée en beuglant. Si ce Pokémon inhale violemment par les orifices de son corps, c'est signe qu'il se prépare à lâcher un énorme beuglement.

name: makuhita
en:
Makuhita (Japanese: マクノシタ Makunoshita) is a Fighting-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Makuhita has a tireless spirit - it will never give up hope. It eats a lot of food, gets plenty of sleep, and it trains very rigorously. By living that way, this Pokémon packs its body with energy.
fr:
Makuhita (Japonais:マクノシタMakunoshita) est unType de combatPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Makuhita a un esprit infatigable - il n'abandonnera jamais l'espoir. Il mange beaucoup de nourriture, dort beaucoup et s'entraîne très rigoureusement. En vivant de cette façon, ce Pokémon remplit son corps d'énergie.

name: hariyama
en:
Hariyama (Japanese: ハリテヤマ Hariteyama) is a Fighting-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Hariyama practices its straight-arm slaps in any number of locations. One hit of this Pokémon's powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches could snap a telephone pole in two.

name: azurill
en:
Azurill (Japanese: ルリリ Ruriri) is a dual-type Normal/Fairy baby Pokémon introduced in Generation III. Prior to Generation VI, it was a pure Normal-type Pokémon.
Azurill's tail is large and bouncy. It is packed full of the nutrients this Pokémon needs to grow. Azurill can be seen bouncing and playing on its big, rubbery tail.

name: nosepass
en:
Nosepass (Japanese: ノズパス Nosepass) is a Rock-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Nosepass's magnetic nose is always pointed to the north. If two of these Pokémon meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they are close because their magnetic noses repel one another.

name: skitty
en:
Skitty (Japanese: エネコ Eneco) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Skitty has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects and chasing them around. This Pokémon is known to chase after its own tail and become dizzy.

name: delcatty
en:
Delcatty (Japanese: エネコロロ Enekororo) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon will never fight - it will just move away somewhere else.
fr:
Delcatty (Japonais:エネコロロEnekororo) est unType normalPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Delcatty dort où il veut sans garder de nid permanent. Si d'autres Pokémon s'en approchent pendant qu'il dort, ce Pokémon ne se battra jamais - il s'éloignera simplement ailleurs.

name: sableye
en:
Sableye (Japanese: ヤミラミ Yamirami) is a dual-type Dark/Ghost Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Sableye lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. They are feared, however, because these Pokémon are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.
fr:
Sableye (Japonais:ヤミラミYamirami) est un type doubleSombre/FantômePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Sableye mène une vie tranquille au plus profond des cavernes. Ils sont cependant craints, car on pense que ces Pokémon volent l'esprit des gens lorsque leurs yeux brûlent d'une lueur sinistre dans l'obscurité.

name: mawile
en:
Mawile (Japanese: クチート Kucheat) is a dual-type Steel/Fairy Pokémon introduced in Generation III. Prior to Generation VI, it was a pure Steel-type Pokémon.
Mawile's huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed. Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard. When the foe least expects it, Mawile chomps it with its gaping jaws.

name: aron
en:
Aron (Japanese: ココドラ Cokodora) is a dual-type Steel/Rock Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
This Pokémon has a body of steel. To make its body, Aron feeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.
fr:
Aron (Japonais:ココドラCokodora) est un type doubleAcier/RochePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Ce Pokémon a un corps en acier. Pour fabriquer son corps, Aron se nourrit de minerai de fer qu'il extrait des montagnes. Parfois, il cause des problèmes majeurs en mangeant des ponts et des rails.

name: lairon
en:
Lairon (Japanese: コドラ Kodora) is a dual-type Steel/Rock Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Lairon tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritious mineral springwater until it is bloated. This Pokémon makes its nest close to springs of delicious water.
fr:
Lairon (Japonais:コドラKodora) est un type doubleAcier/RochePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Lairon tempère son corps d'acier en buvant de l'eau de source minérale hautement nutritive jusqu'à ce qu'il soit gonflé. Ce Pokémon fait son nid près de sources d'eau délicieuse.

name: aggron
en:
Aggron (Japanese: ボスゴドラ Bossgodora) is a dual-type Steel/Rock Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Aggron claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This Pokémon vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.

name: meditite
en:
Meditite (Japanese: アサナン Asanan) is a dual-type Fighting/Psychic Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Meditite undertakes rigorous mental training deep in the mountains. However, whenever it meditates, this Pokémon always loses its concentration and focus. As a result, its training never ends.

name: medicham
en:
Medicham (Japanese: チャーレム Charem) is a dual-type Fighting/Psychic Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed a sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon is known to meditate for a whole month without eating.

name: electrike
en:
Electrike (Japanese: ラクライ Rakurai) is an Electric-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Electrike stores electricity in its long body hair. This Pokémon stimulates its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs explosive acceleration performance.

name: manectric
en:
Manectric (Japanese: ライボルト Livolt) is an Electric-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Manectric is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this Pokémon creates thunderclouds.

name: plusle
en:
Plusle (Japanese: プラスル Prasle) is an Electric-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Plusle always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this Pokémon shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.
fr:
Plusle (Japonais:プラスルPrasle) est unDe type électriquePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Plusle agit toujours comme une pom-pom girl pour ses partenaires. Chaque fois qu'un coéquipier fait un bon effort au combat, ce Pokémon court-circuite son corps pour créer des crépitements d'étincelles pour montrer sa joie.

name: minun
en:
Minun (Japanese: マイナン Minun) is an Electric-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Minun is more concerned about cheering on its partners than its own safety. It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.
fr:
Minun (Japonais:マイナンMinun) est unDe type électriquePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Minun est plus soucieux d'encourager ses partenaires que de sa propre sécurité. Il court-circuite l'électricité dans son corps pour créer de brillantes pluies d'étincelles pour encourager ses coéquipiers.

name: volbeat
en:
Volbeat (Japanese: バルビート Barubeat) is a Bug-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
With the arrival of night, Volbeat emits light from its tail. It communicates with others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light. This Pokémon is attracted by the sweet aroma of Illumise.
fr:
Volbeat (Japonais:バルビートBarubeat) est unType de boguePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Avec l'arrivée de la nuit, Volbeat émet de la lumière depuis sa queue. Il communique avec les autres en ajustant l'intensité et le clignotement de sa lumière. Ce Pokémon est attiré par le doux parfum d'Illumise.

name: illumise
en:
Illumise (Japanese: イルミーゼ Illumise) is a Bug-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Illumise attracts a swarm of Volbeat using a sweet fragrance. Once the Volbeat have gathered, this Pokémon leads the lit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas of the night sky.

name: roselia
en:
Roselia (Japanese: ロゼリア Roselia) is a dual-type Grass/Poison Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Roselia shoots sharp thorns as projectiles at any opponent that tries to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this Pokémon brings serenity to living things.
fr:
Rosélia (Japonais:ロ ゼ リ アRoselia) est un type doubleGazon/PoisonPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Roselia tire des épines acérées comme des projectiles sur tout adversaire qui essaie de voler les fleurs sur ses bras. L'arôme de ce Pokémon apporte la sérénité aux êtres vivants.

name: gulpin
en:
Gulpin (Japanese: ゴクリン Gokulin) is a Poison-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Virtually all of Gulpin's body is its stomach. As a result, it can swallow something its own size. This Pokémon's stomach contains a special fluid that digests anything.

name: swalot
en:
Swalot (Japanese: マルノーム Marunoom) is a Poison-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
When Swalot spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this Pokémon gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.
fr:
Swalot (Japonais:マルノームMarunoom) est unType poisonPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Lorsque Swalot repère une proie, il fait jaillir un liquide horriblement toxique de ses pores et pulvérise la cible. Une fois la proie affaiblie, ce Pokémon l'avale en entier avec sa bouche caverneuse.

name: carvanha
en:
Carvanha (Japanese: キバニア Kibanha) is a dual-type Water/Dark Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Carvanha's strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this Pokémon.
fr:
Carvanha (Japonais:キ バ ニ アKibanha) est un type doubleL'eau/SombrePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Les mâchoires fortement développées de Carvanha et ses crocs pointus ont le pouvoir destructeur d'arracher les coques des bateaux. De nombreux bateaux ont été attaqués et coulés par ce Pokémon.

name: sharpedo
en:
Sharpedo (Japanese: サメハダー Samehader) is a dual-type Water/Dark Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Sharpedo can swim at speeds of up to 75 mph by jetting seawater out of its backside. This Pokémon's drawback is its inability to swim long distances.
fr:
Sharpedo (Japonais:サメハダーSamehader) est un type doubleL'eau/SombrePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Sharpedo peut nager à des vitesses allant jusqu'à 75 mph en projetant de l'eau de mer de son dos. L'inconvénient de ce Pokémon est son incapacité à nager sur de longues distances.

name: wailmer
en:
Wailmer (Japanese: ホエルコ Hoeruko) is a Water-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Wailmer's nostrils are located above its eyes. This playful Pokémon loves to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body out of its nostrils.
fr:
Wailmer (Japonais:ホ エ ル コHoeruko) est unType d'eauPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Les narines de Wailmer sont situées au-dessus de ses yeux. Ce Pokémon espiègle adore effrayer les gens en reniflant avec force l'eau de mer qu'il stocke à l'intérieur de son corps par ses narines.

name: wailord
en:
Wailord (Japanese: ホエルオー Whaloh) is a Water-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Wailord is the largest of all identified Pokémon up to now. This giant Pokémon swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive amounts of food at once with its enormous mouth.

name: numel
en:
Numel (Japanese: ドンメル Donmel) is a dual-type Fire/Ground Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Numel is extremely dull witted - it doesn't notice being hit. However, it can't stand hunger for even a second. This Pokémon's body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.
fr:
Numel (Japonais:ドンメルDonmel) est un type doubleFeu/SolPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Numel est extrêmement stupide - il ne remarque pas qu'il est touché. Cependant, il ne supporte pas la faim même une seconde. Le corps de ce Pokémon est un chaudron bouillonnant de magma bouillant.

name: camerupt
en:
Camerupt (Japanese: バクーダ Bakuuda) is a dual-type Fire/Ground Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
The humps on Camerupt's back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.
fr:
Camérupt (Japonais:バクーダBakouda) est un type doubleFeu/SolPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Les bosses sur le dos de Camerupt sont formées par une transformation de ses os. Ils font parfois exploser du magma en fusion. Ce Pokémon éclate apparemment souvent lorsqu'il est enragé.

name: torkoal
en:
Torkoal (Japanese: コータス Cotoise) is a Fire-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Torkoal digs through mountains in search of coal. If it finds some, it fills hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it. If it is attacked, this Pokémon spouts thick black smoke to beat a retreat.

name: spoink
en:
Spoink (Japanese: バネブー Baneboo) is a Psychic-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Spoink bounces around on its tail. The shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump. As a result, this Pokémon cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it stops, its heart will stop.
fr:
Spoink (Japonais:バネブーBaneboo) est unType psychiquePokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Spoink rebondit sur sa queue. Le choc de ses rebonds fait battre son cœur. En conséquence, ce Pokémon ne peut pas se permettre d'arrêter de rebondir - s'il s'arrête, son cœur s'arrêtera.

name: grumpig
en:
Grumpig (Japanese: ブーピッグ Boopig) is a Psychic-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely. This Pokémon's black pearls are valuable as works of art.

name: spinda
en:
Spinda (Japanese: パッチール Patcheel) is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
All the Spinda that exist in the world are said to have utterly unique spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this Pokémon give it the appearance of dancing.

name: trapinch
en:
Trapinch (Japanese: ナックラー Nuckrar) is a Ground-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Trapinch's nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. This Pokémon patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength to crush even boulders.
fr:
Trapinch (Japonais:ナックラーNukrar) est unType de solPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Le nid de Trapinch est une fosse inclinée en forme de cuvette creusée dans le sable. Ce Pokémon attend patiemment que sa proie tombe dans la fosse. Ses mâchoires géantes ont assez de force pour écraser même les rochers.

name: vibrava
en:
Vibrava (Japanese: ビブラーバ Vibrava) is a dual-type Ground/Dragon Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
To make prey faint, Vibrava generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously making its two wings vibrate. This Pokémon's ultrasonic waves are so powerful, they can bring on headaches in people.
fr:
Vibrava (Japonais:ビブラーバVibrava) est un type doubleSol/DragonPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Pour faire s'évanouir sa proie, Vibrava génère des ondes ultrasonores en faisant vigoureusement vibrer ses deux ailes. Les ondes ultrasonores de ce Pokémon sont si puissantes qu'elles peuvent provoquer des maux de tête chez les humains.

name: flygon
en:
Flygon (Japanese: フライゴン Flygon) is a dual-type Ground/Dragon Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Flygon whips up a sandstorm by flapping its wings. The wings create a series of notes that sound like singing. Because the "singing" is the only thing that can be heard in a sandstorm, this Pokémon is said to be the desert spirit.
fr:
Flygon (Japonais:フライゴンFlygon) est un type doubleSol/DragonPokémonintroduit dansGénération III.
Flygon attise une tempête de sable en battant des ailes. Les ailes créent une série de notes qui ressemblent à un chant. Parce que le "chant" est la seule chose que l'on puisse entendre dans une tempête de sable, on dit que ce Pokémon est l'esprit du désert.

name: cacnea
en:
Cacnea (Japanese: サボネア Sabonea) is a Grass-type Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
Cacnea lives in arid locations such as deserts. It releases a strong aroma from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this Pokémon shoots sharp thorns from its body to bring the victim down.

name: cacturne
en:
Cacturne (Japanese: ノクタス Noctus) is a dual-type Grass/Dark Pokémon introduced in Generation III.
